alert.note: Alert for Camden; Charlton; Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 13 at 7:01PM EDT until June 13 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 284 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER DUVAL NASSAU IN NORTHERN FLORIDA COLUMBIA HAMILTON SUWANNEE IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA CAMDEN CHARLTON GLYNN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ARLINGTON, BELMONT, COLUMBIA, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, GLYNN HAVEN, HILLIARD, HOMELAND, HOUSTON, JACKSONVILLE, JASPER, JEKYLL ISLAND, JENNINGS, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, LAKE CITY, LIVE OAK, LULU, MACCLENNY, MCALPIN, NEWBURN, NORMANDY, OCEANWAY, OLENO STATE PARK, OLUSTEE, ORTEGA, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, SEA ISLAND, ST. GEORGE, ST. SIMONS, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, SUWANNEE SPRINGS, THALMANN, WATERTOWN, WEST LAKE, WHITE SPRINGS, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.
